artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
text: Right panel of triptych: P.75.51.200 (R), P.75.51.199 (C), P.75.51.198 (L). This triptych represents the scene of "dohyō-iri" ceremony, this wrestler apperars to be "tsuyu-harai", the herald, one of the two attendants of a "yokozuna" wrestler.
title: Wrestler Kurokumo Ryūgorō from Higo Province
